item.title: N2CMS Meet VWT2OC: Day 3 – Grinding to a Halt!
item.description: Well, it was going way too well to last.  It’s become apparent that the existing site is in some sort of half migrated mangled state after the hosting provider changed systems.  This has been like a half-brick to the head as when they’ve tried to fix the issue, more and more keep getting uncovered.  The sites been down for most of the day as a result (and is still down 24 hours later ….
